name: END yourself to HEAVEN (Brackeys Jam 2023.1)
description:
This is a game for the Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1 with the Theme:

AN END IS A NEW BEGINNING

Art, Code, Music etc. were made in 7 days.

====Story======

It's about a kid who dies and ends up in HELL. And of course he doesn't like that, so the Devil gives him a Chance: If he dies in all the Lives in Hell he can go to HEAVEN.

====Controls====

PAUSE: ESCAPE

Move: WASD / Arrow Keys

Jump: Space

Shoot: X / Left Mouse-button
